# Core Rule 7 ## Do not use out of game methods to communicate with other players. [bold]This is non-negotiable, zero tolerance and will result in a permanent ban.[/bold]
Do not use any out of game methods to communicate with other players during a round.
It is at the admins discretion to determine if you are metacommunicating. There are tells.
All participants found to be metacommunicating will be permanently banned.
